priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C105140

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Test Code Terminology

definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory test code.
name: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding eating: which best describes {S} usual performance during the past 4 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Eating

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding walking (or getting around in a wheelchair), in the past 4 weeks, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Optimal Performance of Walking

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding bowel and bladder function at the toilet, which best describes his/her usual performance in the past 4 weeks.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Usual Bowel and Bladder Function at Toilet

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding bathing, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes his/her usual performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Bathing

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding grooming, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Optimal Performance of Grooming

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding dressing in the past 4 weeks: Did {S} select his/her first set of clothes for the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Select First Clothes for the Day
synonyms: ADL01-Select First Clothes for the Day

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes usual performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Dressing

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Regarding physically getting dressed, which best describes his/her usual performance in the past 4 weeks.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Physically Getting Dressed

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a telephone?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Use a Telephone

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Highest Performance of Telephone Use

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} watch television?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Watch Television

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} usually select or ask for different programs or his/her favorite show?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Select or Ask for Television Program

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} usually talk about the content of a program while watching it?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About TV Content While Watching
synonyms: ADL01-Talk About TV Content While Watch

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} talk about the content of a program within a day (24 hours) after watching it?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About TV Content Within a Day After Watching
synonyms: ADL01-Talk About TV Content Within a Day

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever appear to pay attention to conversation or small talk for at least 5 minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pay Attention to Conversation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her usual degree of participation.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Usual Conversation Participation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} clear the dishes from the table after a meal or snack?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Clear Dishes After Meal or Snack

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Clearing Dishes

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually manage to find his/her personal belongings at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Find Personal Belongings at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Finding Personal Belonging at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} obtain a hot or cold beverage for him/herself?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Obtain Beverage for Self

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Highest Performance of Obtaining Beverage

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} make him/herself a meal or snack at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Make a Meal or Snack at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of food preparation.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Highest Level of Food Preparation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} dispose of garbage or litter in an appropriate place or container at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Dispose of Garbage in Appropriate Place at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Garbage Disposal

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} get around (or travel) outside of his/her home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Get Around Outside Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Optimal Performance of Getting Around Outside of Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever go shopping?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Go Shopping

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which one best describes how {S} usually selects items.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - How Subject Usually Selects Items

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} usually pay for items without supervision or physical help?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pay for Items Without Supervision or Physical Help

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} keep appointments or meetings with other people, such as relatives, a doctor, the hairdresser, etc.?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Keep Appointments or Meetings with Others

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes his/her awareness of the meeting ahead of time.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Awareness of Appointment Ahead of Time
synonyms: ADL01-Aware of Appointment Ahead of Time

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, was {S} ever left on his/her own?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Subject Left on Their Own

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Was {S} left away from home, for 15 minutes or longer, during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Left Away From Home for Fifteen Minutes or Longer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Was {S} left: at home, for an hour or longer, during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Left at Home for One Hour or Longer
synonyms: ADL01-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Was {S} left at home, for less than 1 hour, during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Left at Home for Less Than One Hour
synonyms: ADL01-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} talk about current events?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About Current Events

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} talk about events that he/she heard or read about or saw on TV but did not take part in?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About Events on TV that Subject Did not Take Part In

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} talk about events that he/she took part in outside home involving family, friends, or neighbors?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About Events Outside of Home that Subject Took Part In

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} talk about events that occurred at home that he/she took part in or watched?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About Events at Home that Subject Took Part in or Watched

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} read a magazine, newspaper or book for more than 5 minutes at a time?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Read for More Than Five Minutes

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} usually talk about details of what he/she read while or shortly (less than 1 hour) after reading?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About What Subject Read Less Than One Hour After Reading

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Did {S} usually talk about what he/she read 1 hour or longer after reading?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Talk About What Subject Read More Than One Hour After Reading
synonyms: ADL01-Talk 1 Hour or More After Reading

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever write things down?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Write Things Down

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, which best describes the most complicated things that he/she wrote.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Most Complicated Writings

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} perform a pastime, hobby or game?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Perform Pastime, Hobby or Game

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: Card or board games.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Card or Board Games

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: bingo.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Bingo

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: crosswords.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Crosswords

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: art.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Art

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: musical instrument.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Musical Instrument

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: knitting.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Knitting

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: sewing.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Sewing

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: reading.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Reading

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: gardening.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Gardening

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: golf.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Golf

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: tennis.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Tennis

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: workshop.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Workshop

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: fishing.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Fishing

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: other.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Other

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Which pastimes did he/she perform: other specify.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Pastime: Other Specify

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If {S} performs hobbies/pastimes only at day care, check here.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Performed Hobbies Only at Day Care

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, how did {S} usually perform his/her most common pastimes.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Performance of Common Pastimes

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a household appliance to do chores?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Use Household Appliance to do Chores

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: washer.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Washer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: dryer.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Dryer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: vacuum.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Vacuum

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: dishwasher.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Dishwasher

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: toaster.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Toaster

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: toaster oven.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Toaster Oven

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: range.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Range

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: microwave.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Microwave

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: food processor.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Food Processor

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: other.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Other

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Check all that were used: other specify.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Appliance: Other Specify

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - If yes, for the most commonly used appliances, which best describes how {S} usually used them.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Description of Usual Use of Commonly Used Appliances

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Total Score.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Total Score

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory - Number of 'Don't Know' Responses.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL - Number of 'Don't Know' Responses
